name: Heri Ramampiaro
content: Heri Ramampiaro's Homepage Heri Ramampiaro is Head of department and professor at the Department of Computer Science, (NTNU) Trondheim. He is also Director of the Norwegian Open AI-Lab at NTNU. Ramampiaro is currently member of the Norwegian National Geodata Council, appointed by the Norwegian goverment (2024-2027). He has chaired the Expert Group on Sharing of Industrial data (2021-2022), also appointed by the Norwegian government. Ramampiaroâ€™s current main research interests include data and text mining and machine learning. Tweets by @heriram Contact info: Name: Heri Ramampiaro Department at NTNU: Computer Science (IDI) Email: heri{raplace with at}ntnu.no
